Index.subtitle2: Stable, fast downloads for your software.

Accordion.answer1: Veodra Mirror provides a software download channel for small and medium-sized developers, and can provide high-speed downloads in highly censored areas.
Accordion.answer2: Veodra Mirror regularly checks for updates from GitHub Release and uses Cloudflare R2 to automatically cache and manage your Release content.
Accordion.answer3: During the beta ver., each registered user has 10 GB of storage space in the Free plan. If you need more storage, please wait for the stable ver. to go online.
Accordion.answer4-1: 1. In order to ensure the stability and availability of this mirror, please do not attempt to apply for a mirror that violates the content of any country's laws.
Accordion.answer4-2: 2. Storage servers have costs, so please do not attempt to register multiple accounts to obtain free storage space.
Accordion.answer4-3: 3. This mirror will not modify your Release content, but will review your Release content to a certain extent.
